citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Annual heartworm testing for dogs is not being performed as described in the program of veterinary care. Following the
program of veterinary care as directed by the attending veterinarian is important for the health and prevention of disease
in the animals. Correct by September 27, 2023 by testing dogs for heartworms as described in the program of veterinary
care.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
Additional Inspectors:
Kem Singletary, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Annual heartworm testing for dogs is not being performed as described in the program of veterinary care. Following the 
program of veterinary care as directed by the attending veterinarian is important for the health and prevention of disease 
in the animals. Correct by September 27, 2023 by testing dogs for heartworms as described in the program of veterinary 
care. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Kem Singletary, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n
